oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-02-12 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two recordings of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Audrey Williams (performer), one on February 12, 1951 and the other on February 13, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Audrey Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the first tune -- Move It On Over (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces Audrey Williams and the next tune -- Waltz Of The Wind (Audrey Williams) -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- I'll Have A New Body (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme -- [break] -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams and Louis Buck talk -- Hank Williams introduces the first tune -- Faded Love And Winter Roses (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck and Hank Williams) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Four Flusher (Audrey Williams) -- Hank Williams talks -- [Hank Williams bad take] -- I Saw The Light (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement's (Hank Williams and Loius Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971;
